abstract.p: Stephen Greco letter comments on May 16 on cybersex addiction; drawing

block.p: Need the coverage of ''cybersex addictions'' on May 16 have been framed in such sex-negative terms? Some see the Internet as a new ground for healthy experimentation and role-playing -- a safe alternative to premature action and a welcome counter to the erotic inertia that can keep people from discovering potentially fulfilling tastes and satisfying flavors.

To me, it makes sense that upon the first inkling of additional tastes and flavors, someone would invest some time exploring. If the results get people to rethink old relationships and jobs, well, great.
